output_list.reason: The mint function has an integer overflow that allows the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value.
The unfreeze function has an access control flaw where only the team members can call it.
The transfer function has an integer overflow where the attacker can manipulate the balance of the victim.
The transferFrom function has an integer overflow where the attacker can manipulate the balance of the victim.
The approve function has an integer overflow where the attacker can manipulate the balance of the victim.
